CHARLEY PRIVACY POLICY

Last Updated: June 8, 2025 | Effective Date: June 8, 2025
IMPORTANT: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use CHARLEY.

Welcome to CHARLEY's Privacy Policy. This policy describes how Baobab Technologies, Inc. ("CHARLEY," "we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, shares, and protects your personal information when you use our dating, networking, and social connection platform and related services (collectively, the "Services").

1. INFORMATION WE COLLECT

1.1 Information You Provide to Us:

  • Account Information: Name, email address, phone number, date of birth, and password
  • Profile Information: Photos, bio, interests, preferences, and other profile details
  • Communication Data: Messages, calls, and other communications through our Services
  • Payment Information: Billing details for premium subscriptions (processed securely)
  • Verification Documents: Government-issued ID or other verification materials
  • Support Communications: Information provided when contacting customer support

1.2 Information We Collect Automatically:

  • Device Information: Device type, operating system, unique device identifiers
  • Usage Information: App features used, time spent, interaction patterns
  • Location Information: Approximate location based on IP address or GPS (with permission)
  • Log Information: IP addresses, browser type, access times, pages viewed
  • Cookies and Similar Technologies: To enhance your experience and analyze usage

2. HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION

2.1 Core Service Functionality:

  • Create and maintain your account and profile
  • Match you with other users based on compatibility and preferences
  • Enable communication between matched users
  • Process payments for premium features and subscriptions
  • Provide customer support and respond to your inquiries
  • Verify your identity and maintain platform security

2.2 Platform Safety and Security:

  • Detect and prevent spam, fraud, and harmful behavior
  • Monitor for violations of our Terms of Service
  • Investigate reports of abuse, harassment, or inappropriate content
  • Implement safety features and user protection measures
  • Comply with legal obligations and law enforcement requests

2.3 Service Improvement and Personalization:

  • Analyze usage patterns to improve features and user experience
  • Develop and test new products, features, and services
  • Personalize content recommendations and matching algorithms
  • Conduct research and analytics for business insights
  • Optimize platform performance and reliability

3. INFORMATION SHARING AND DISCLOSURE

3.1 With Other Users:

  • Profile information you choose to share publicly
  • Messages and communications with matched users
  • Activity status and online presence (if not disabled)

3.2 With Service Providers:

  • Third-party vendors who help us operate and improve our Services
  • Payment processors for subscription and purchase transactions
  • Cloud storage and hosting providers for data storage
  • Analytics and marketing service providers

3.3 For Legal and Safety Reasons:

  • When required by law, regulation, or legal process
  • To protect the safety and security of our users
  • To prevent fraud, abuse, or violations of our Terms
  • In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

4. DATA RETENTION AND DELETION

4.1 Retention Period: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide our Services. We may retain certain information for legitimate business purposes or legal compliance.

4.2 Account Deletion: You can delete your account at any time through the app settings. Upon deletion, we will remove your profile and personal information, though some data may be retained for legal or safety purposes.

5. YOUR PRIVACY RIGHTS AND CHOICES

5.1 Access and Control: You can access, update, or delete your account information through the app settings at any time.

5.2 Communication Preferences: You can opt out of promotional communications while still receiving important service-related messages.

5.3 Location Sharing: You can control location sharing through your device settings or app preferences.

6. DATA SECURITY

We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no security system is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

7. INTERNATIONAL DATA TRANSFERS

Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

8. CHILDREN'S PRIVACY

Our Services are intended for users who are at least 14 years old. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 14. If we become aware of such collection, we will take steps to delete the information.

9. CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes through the app or by email. Your continued use of our Services after changes become effective constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
